question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-file-checker/src/processor.rs] [Function: run()] [File format validation] After downloading files, is the Lz4CompressedProto format validated before comparison, or can corrupted compression headers pass verification? (Medium)
